channel.title: Hey help please i'l be very grateful and rep+++++++++++
channel.description:
well i was editing my shop assistant for slayershop and i took torso out of my prices.txt/ i compiled and go no errors but when i run the server i get
[IMG]http://i1097.photobucket.com/albums/g356/ut342nr/bandicam2012-08-1920-06-04-369.jpg[/img]
plz helppppp please

item.title: Hey help please i'l be very grateful and rep+++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

[quote=“joelandjacob, post:8, topic:455077”]You guys that commented before are all COMPLETE idiots. You can’t take out an item in prices.txt…
You have to keep all the items in there, then you can just change the price. DONT REMOVE IT.[/quote]
in turn, to allow the files to be edited, edit the lines i described before…

Read full topic

item.title: Hey help please i'l be very grateful and rep+++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @joelandjacob joelandjacob
item.description:
@joelandjacob wrote:

You guys that commented before are all COMPLETE idiots. You can’t take out an item in prices.txt…
You have to keep all the items in there, then you can just change the price. DONT REMOVE IT.

item.title: Hey help please i'l be very grateful and rep+++++++++++
item.dc:creator: @ggallin ggallin
item.description:
@ggallin wrote:

@OP. something you need to keep in mind is that when you google all the terms and actually do your homework you’ll understand what everything means. Instead of asking people to spoonfeed you :). I’d say look at the main exception in thread error. It says that the culprit is most likely in server.java and can be found on line 70, itemhandler.java on line 36 and 324.

Read full topic
